name: Void Invasion
info: The portal you opened has attracted unwanted attention. A massive invasion from the Void Realm threatens all existence, Rally the realm's defenders and push back this otherworldly threat before reality itself is consumed by the void.
dialogs: The void tears reality apart! We must act quickly or all will be lost!
I will stand against this invasion. Tell me how to stop them.
Build fortifications quickly! The next wave will be even stronger!
You cannot stop the inevitable! The void will consume everything!
The portal is sealed. The realm is safe thanks to your bravery.
accept: I will stand against this invasion. Tell me how to stop them.
decline: The void forces are too powerful.
